flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=3>>3 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 3 brothers = <<7-3=4>>4 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 3 + 7 = <<3+7=10>>10 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 10 - 4 = <<10-4=6>>6 more presents in the second half of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
